content.rendered:
Directed by Aban Bharucha Deohans

Written by Aban Bharucha Deohans

Cast Sahil Vaid(Amit Chauhan). Saurrabh Kushwaha(Inspector Kabir Ahmed). Pankaj Anand(Irfan Bhai). Manoj Bajpayee(ACP Avinash Verma). Hitha Chandrashekar(Kavita Khanna). Rahul Chowdhary(Dadu). Prachi Desai(Sanjana Bhatia). Rahull Dutt(Vinod). Sohila Kapoor(Nirmala Devi). Sohaila Kapur(Mrs. Chaudhary). Ashton Kellogg(Police officer (credit only)). Micky Makhija(Dr. Rao). Arjun Mathur(Ravi Khanna). Rohan Roy(Drug dealer). Vaquar Shaikh(Raj Gupta). Shishir Sharma(Justice Chaudhari). Bushan Shimpi(Constable Javed). Barkha Singh(Pooja Choudhari). Denzil Smith(Commissioner Sanjay Sharma). Amit Thakkar(Rishabh). Ujjwal(Saneshwar / Sunny (as Ujjawal Gauraha Shiva)). Garima Yajnik(Kia). (0)

Language Hindi

Producers Akshay Balsaraf. Kiran Deohans. Sumit Khurana.

Production Candid Creations.. Zee Studios
